typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{02e7ebe8-e09c-40f5-ba46-ab465bd0f73f} as string,
		Kelemen as string,
		Orsos as string,
		{5555550673} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000004} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000005} as string,
		SR as string,
		{3d034f2a-b657-4c80-b312-6adb8e1c99b8} as string,
		{155 Pine St} as string,
		Prop_9 as string,
		Portland as string,
		OR as string,
		{85101} as string,
		{1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRRatingFromRAW
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FCRatingFromRAW
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VARatingFromRaw
SRRatingFromRAW select(mapColumn(
		Rating = rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RatingFieldSelect
FCRatingFromRAW select(mapColumn(
		Rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FCRatingFieldSelect
VARatingFromRaw select(mapColumn(
		Rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VARatingFieldSelect
RatingFieldSelect, FCRatingFieldSelect, VARatingFieldSelect union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(input(
		{02e7ebe8-e09c-40f5-ba46-ab465bd0f73f} as string,
		Kelemen as string,
		Orsos as string,
		{5555550673} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000004} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000005} as string,
		SR as string,
		{3d034f2a-b657-4c80-b312-6adb8e1c99b8} as string,
		{155 Pine St} as string,
		Prop_9 as string,
		Portland as string,
		OR as string,
		{85101} as string,
		{1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Ratings
